author: Staff Reporter
text:
In its bid to curb paid news, the elections department will keep monitoring election related news and features appearing in the print and electronic media, Chief Electoral Officer V. Candavelou has said.

Speaking at a programme on Role of media in elections, he said the media should maintain a level playing field. On the directions of the commission, a district level media certification and monitoring committee has been established in Puducherry and Karaikal. He added the committee would be responsible for certification of advertisements, monitoring of news in print and electronic media and maintaining records of all election-related news of candidates. P.T. Rudra Goud, Joint Chief Electoral Officer, R. Shridaran, Deputy Chief Electoral Officer participated.
title: EC bid to curb paid news
